llm_command:
kubectl apply -n frontend -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: allow-frontend-ingress
  namespace: frontend
spec:
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  ingress:
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: adservice
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: cartservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 9555
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 7070
EOF
output:

default              Active   9h

kube-public          Active   9h
kube-system          Active   9h
local-path-storage   Active   9h
